src:
Kecmanović izgubio, ali šansa postoji
06 Nov 2019, 18:27 by Milos
Miomir Kecmanović pretrpeo je poraz u drugoj rundi A grupe NextGen ATP finala u Milanu.
Mladi srpski teniser izgubio je od Australijanca Aleksa De Minora sa 3:1, po setovima 4:1, 4:3(4), 1:4, 4:0 nakon jednog časa i 26 minuta igre.
Kecmamović je u prvom kolu pobedio Norvežanina Kaspera Ruda, a u trećem kolu mu je rival Alehander Davidovič-Fokina iz Španije. U slučaju pobede, Miomir bi mogao da se nađe u polufinalu ovog turnira.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Kecmanovic lost, but the chance exists
06 Nov 2019, 17:27 by Milos
Miomir Kecmanovic was defeated in the second round of Group A of the NextGen ATP Finals in Milan.
The young Serbian tennis player lost to Australian Alex De Minor 3: 1, 4: 1, 4: 3 (4), 1: 4, 4: 0 after one hour and 26 minutes of play.
Kecmamovic defeated Norwegian Kasper Rud in the first round and his rival Alehander Davidovich-Fokina from Spain in the third round. In the event of a win, Miomir could reach the semifinals of this tournament.
